channel.title: Mieke on Wsl Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mieke on Wsl Blog

item.title: Mieke, Part 1
item.description: It’s hard to tell stories about someone who means so much to you, who has left a massive mark on your life, and whose presence will be missed more than I can possibly describe. I decided the best way was to just start at the beginning, and write stories as I thought of them. This is the first in a series of posts about Mieke, starting at the beginning and roughly chronicling the past 13 years.
